########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

add_subdirectory(bindings)

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
gr_python_install(FILES __init__.py
    read_gold_seq.py
    addSubSelect.py
    dynamic_padder_py.py
    correlate_and_tag_py.py
    filter_payload_py.py
    Precoder.py
    #Dynamic_Padder.py 
    DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/gnuradio/OTA_FL)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-OTA_FL)

# Create a package directory that tests can import. It includes everything
# from `python/`.
add_custom_target(
    copy_module_for_tests ALL
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
            ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test_modules/gnuradio/OTA_FL/)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_read_gold_seq ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_read_gold_seq.py)

GR_ADD_TEST(qa_correlate_and_tag_py ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_correlate_and_tag_py.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_filter_payload_py ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_filter_payload_py.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_Precoder ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_Precoder.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_Dynamic_Padder ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_Dynamic_Padder.py)
